synopsis.text: A young cow herding boy possesses extraordinary musical talent playing the flute. He travels through the countryside with his faithful water buffalo companion. When the boy rests in a tree one day, he dreams that his beloved buffalo companion has disappeared. Distraught, he searches everywhere but cannot find the buffalo. Finally discovering the buffalo hiding nearby yet refusing to move, the resourceful boy picks up his flute and plays a heartfelt melody. The beautiful music soon captivates the buffalo, compelling it to emerge from hiding and reunite with the overjoyed boy. Their bond renewed, the two loyal friends continue their journey together through the rural landscapes. This wholesome anime promises touching relationships, pastoral scenery, and the power of music to overcome adversity - a joyful experience for all ages.
